trans-unit.source: Represents a stored procedure in the data store.
The DesignerDataStoredProcedure class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
The DesignerDataStoredProcedure class represents a single table in the data store.

A collection of DesignerDataStoredProcedure objects is returned when you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method with the `schemaClass` parameter set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.StoredProcedures?displayProperty=fullName>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure"></xref> class with the specified name.
The name of the stored procedure.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure"></xref> class with the specified name and owner.
The name of the stored procedure.
The data store owner of the stored procedure.
When overridden in a derived class, returns a collection of parameters for the stored procedure.

The CreateParameters method is called the first time the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure.Parameters%2A> property is accessed to populate the collection of stored-procedure parameters.
A collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataParameter"></xref> objects.
Gets the name of the stored procedure.
The name of the stored procedure.
Gets the owner of the stored procedure.
The owner of the stored procedure.
Gets a collection of parameters required for a stored procedure.
The Parameters property is populated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataStoredProcedure.CreateParameters%2A> method the first time the Parameters property is accessed.
A collection of parameters for the stored procedure.
